description:
Completely Uninstall Unwanted Software, Windows Apps & Browser Plug-ins

IObit Uninstaller is a powerful tool designed to thoroughly remove unwanted programs, browser plug-ins, and Windows apps. It ensures a clean and smooth PC by detecting and uninstalling stubborn software and associated files. With features like batch uninstallation, software health management, and browser protection, IObit Uninstaller enhances system performance and security.
v15.0 2025-08-20
- Upgraded uninstall engine for faster and more thorough program removal
- Enhanced silent uninstallation to be more automatic without any manual operations
- Enlarged Stubborn Program database to support removing 4000+ stubborn programs
- Optimized Software Health for deeper residual cleaning and more accurate detection of software's impact on system performance
- Added support for ARM systems
- Two skins: dark and light
- Supported 39 languages
